subject: [PATCH v2 1/2] mm: vmalloc: streamline vmalloc memory accounting

reviews.author: Vishal (Oracle)
reviews.raw_body:
On Mon, Feb 23, 2026 at 11:01:06AM -0500, Johannes Weiner wrote:
> Use a vmstat counter instead of a custom, open-coded atomic. This has
> the added benefit of making the data available per-node, and prepares
> for cleaning up the memcg accounting as well.
> 
> Acked-by: Shakeel Butt <shakeel.butt@linux.dev>
> Signed-off-by: Johannes Weiner <hannes@cmpxchg.org>

Reviewed-by: Vishal Moola (Oracle) <vishal.moola@gmail.com>

2026-02-23.patch_summary: Use a vmstat counter instead of a custom, open-coded atomic. This has the added benefit of making the data available per-node, and prepares for cleaning up the memcg accounting as well.
